root.TITLE: STANDARD OIL <SRD> TO FORM FINANCIAL UNIT
root.BODY: Standard Oil Co and BP North America Inc said they plan to form a venture to manage the money market borrowing and investment activities of both companies. BP North America is a subsidiary of British Petroleum Co Plc <BP>, which also owns a 55 pct interest in Standard Oil. The venture will be called BP/Standard Financial Trading and will be operated by Standard Oil under the oversight of a joint management committee.
